name: Minokami (Ludum Dare 42 Game Jam)
description:
This is a local multiplayer game in which you have to score balls in your opponent's basket while a lot of boxes are falling. Use WASD Keys (Player 1) or Arrow Keys (Player 2) to move right or left, jump with W or Up Arrow and throw a ball with S or Down Arrow. Have fun!

Floor tiles with different colours have different properties (bouncy, sticky and sliding).
